AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Drudgery worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born as a worker under the queen, [PAWN_nameDef] will likely never live to do anything but be that which many will trade for; someone more than capable of dumb labor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Royal attendant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tireless servant responsible for the caring, cleaning and feeding of the queen.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Disgraced guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked to protect [PAWN_possessive] queen from danger, but fell from grace after an embarrassing incident involving a pineapple. \nStripped of [PAWN_possessive] position and ashamed, every time [PAWN_nameDef] looks upon a piece of fruit [PAWN_pronoun] is reminded of [PAWN_possessive] failure.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Scout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The long periods spent out of the hive has made [PAWN_nameDef] a resilient individual, well suited to reconnaissance and vanguard work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Undertaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for disposing of corpses outside of the hive. This was a thankless yet vital job, lest the dead bodies attract predators.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Honeycomb architect
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Responsible for secreting wax and building the honeycombs, [PAWN_nameDef] would spend most of [PAWN_possessive] time doing exactly that, and only that. Unfortunately, [PAWN_possessive] constant business had left [PAWN_possessive] with little time for socialization or other skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hiveless
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is without a hive, and without a home. Displaced, [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn to survive on [PAWN_possessive] own. Yet [PAWN_nameDef] also discovered the beauty in everything around [PAWN_possessive].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Veteran soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Dangerous and lethal, [PAWN_nameDef] is likely the definition of “nope” in many galactic textbooks. However [PAWN_pronoun] has a softer side, dutifully tending [PAWN_possessive] fellow soldiers on the battlefield.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pollen-tician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A recent position, made out of spite of the traditional monarchy, [PAWN_nameDef] has become a Pollen-tician, much to the despair of [PAWN_possessive] community

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Nursemaid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] cared for the young of the hive.
